pageContext.claim: “We had a very serious violation today because I gave an interview to Bloomberg yesterday and I said off the record some things about Canada … and they gave it out and it's a big story today.”
pageContext.analysis: Bloomberg said it honored its agreement with Trump to keep his comments off the record and there's no evidence they "gave it out." Daniel Dale, a reporter for the Toronto Star, obtained Trump's off-the-record statements about Canada from this Bloomberg interview and published them. Dale said he did not get Trump's off-the-record comments from Bloomberg.
